    public class YearlyViewActivity
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Used for displaying the yearly view for the income and expenses entry data.
    Since:
    2020.04.20
    Version:
    1.7
    Author:
    Olli Pertovaara
